archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.6.11: A set of tailored information security controls should be maintained to meet the needs of ICS environments, taking account of their effect on the safety, reliability and availability (SRA) of ICS and the physical machinery they control.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
